short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color code your Shopify 'Orders' page based on tags

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add a pop of color to your Shopify orders with this chrome extension! 

Easily color code your orders based on tags for quick and easy organization. Say goodbye to missing important orders!

Simply enter a tag your team uses and assign it a color. Any orders with that tag will be highlighted so you never skim past them again!
